cells.data:
1. Make you changes in the master branch of 
  2. Commit changes
  3. Switch to the gh-pages branch in Github desktop app
  4. Update the branch from master
  5. Sync the repo (even though there are no changes - this updates the gh-pages branch in the repo)
  6. The live site is at http://brightcovelearning.github.io/BCL-Brightcove-Player-Samples/
